rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious foyer that doubles as a living area with a blend of modern minimalism and Vastu alignment. Natural light is maximized through strategically placed floor-to-ceiling windows.

rooms.name: Dining & Kitchen
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area, featuring a modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances and an open dining space. Designed for family gatherings and socializing.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest room with ample natural lighting, integrated into the flow of the house for easy access from the living area.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office space optimized for productivity and privacy, with soundproofing and ergonomic design. Includes built-in storage solutions.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A fully-equipped private gym designed for high-intensity workouts, featuring eco-friendly materials and ample space for cardio and weight training.

rooms.name: Utility & Service Area
rooms.description: Includes laundry room, storage spaces, and other service areas. Designed to be efficient and minimalistic in footprint.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: A grand entrance with a modern design, incorporating energy-efficient glass doors and ample natural light.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Separate access for service personnel and delivery services to minimize disturbance in the living spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master suite with floor-to-ceiling windows offering panoramic views, built-in wardrobes, and a private ensuite bathroom. Vastu-aligned for tranquility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A well-appointed bedroom with natural lighting and eco-friendly design, ensuring comfort and privacy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: A versatile space designed for relaxation or additional workspace if needed, keeping in line with modern bachelor pad aesthetics.

openings.name: Private Balcony
openings.description: An exclusive balcony adjoining the master bedroom, offering outdoor relaxation space with eco-friendly design elements.

openings.name: Fire Exit
openings.description: Compliant with safety regulations, ensures quick evacuation in case of emergencies.
